name: Torben Van Assche
synopsis: Hello, my name is Torben and welcome to my portfolio! I am a developer with a passion for games, but I am also very interested in doing 3D, I would consider myself a technical artist or gameplay programmer if I had to make a choice. As a developer its important to know a little bit about everything, and you never know enough! I am always looking for a new opportunity to showcase what I can do and make some magic happen.

I graduated Digital Arts and Entertainment in Kortrijk (Belgium), and have since been working on different projects to expand my knowledge on various fronts. I spend a lot of free time doing research into Unity, and I always enjoy trying out some unique concepts in it. That being said, when I take some time of from coding, I either play games or watch anime.
